mapper.insert: Insert into room (name, surface, capacity, status, event_id) values (#{room.name}, #{room.surface}, #{room.capacity}, #{room.status}, #{room.event.getId()})
mapper.sql: Select r.id as room_id, r.name as room_name, r.surface as room_surface, r.capacity as room_capacity, r.status as room_status, ev.id as event_id, ev.name as event_name, ev.theme as event_theme, ev.base_ticket_price as event_base_ticket_price, ev.start_date as event_start_date, ev.end_date as event_end_date, ev.address as event_address, ev.description as event_description, e.id as employee_id, e.first_name as employee_first_name, e.last_name as employee_last_name, e.address as employee_address, e.phone as employee_phone, e.email as employee_email, e.salary as employee_salary from room r left join event ev on r.event_id = ev.id left join event_employee ee on ee.event_id = ev.id left join employee e on ee.employee_id = e.id
mapper.update: Update room set name = #{room.name}, surface = #{room.surface}, capacity = #{room.capacity}, status = #{room.status}, event_id = #{room.event.getId()} where id = #{id}
